ygData.subject: Re: An idea for the slow day
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep Monks definetly need a weapon that proces  (casts a spell) Maybe brass knuckles or a multi spiked glove(s) with cool graphics! They could proc some DD
ygData.messageBody:
Yep
Monks definetly need a weapon that proces (casts a spell)
Maybe brass knuckles or a multi spiked glove(s) with cool graphics!
They could proc some DD spell, maybe a greater heal spell or a
clinging/dooming darkness - at high levels Monks have trouble becase we
cant root, Clining/Dooming darkness is cool because it slows the critter
down to a crawl and does good DOT damge.


On Fri, 27 Aug 1999, Ronnie wrote:

> From: "Ronnie" <ronnien@...>
>
> A monk only weapon, now before someone say but out fists are our weapons
> listen for a sec. Wouldn't it be cool if there were magic gloves with
> effects? I personally would love to wield a pair of gloves that cast an
> effect, like life tap or shock of frost. There are just not enough Monk
> only stuff out there, other then the PoF stuff and the sashes and head bands
> I think this would be a nice addition, maybe along with a nifty looking robe
> for monks.
>
> Palerose Darkthron ~24 circle monk of the Ashen order~ (Tunare server)
>
